title: 从DPCC到DPCC-ESO再到MFPCC-ESO
content:
综述
原理
DPCC
永磁电机建模如下：
{ud=Lddiddt−ωeLqiq+Rsiduq=Lqdiqdt+ωeLdid+ωeψf+Rsiq    \left\{ \begin{array}{l}
    {u_d} = {L_d}\frac{ {d{i_d}} }{ {dt} } - {\omega _e}{L_q}{i_q} + {R_s}{i_d} & \\
    {u_q} = {L_q}\frac{ {d{i_q}} }{ {dt} } + {\omega _e}{L_d}{i_d} + {\omega _e}{\psi _f} + {R_s}{i_q}
    \end{array} 
    \right.
{ud​=Ld​dtdid​​−ωe​Lq​iq​+Rs​id​uq​=Lq​dtdiq​​+ωe​Ld​id​+ωe​ψf​+Rs​iq​​

MFPCC+ESO
